text: Dan van Husen (30 April 1945 â€“ 31 May 2020) was a German actor. He appeared in some Hollywood movies. He was born in Gummersbach, Germany. Van Husen was known for his roles in Fellini Casanova, by Federico Fellini, in Salon Kitty by Tinto Brass and Nosferatu the Vampyre directed by Werner Herzog. Van Husen died on 31 May 2020 in Somerset, England of COVID-19, aged 75.Duitse Oorlogswinter-acteur Dan van Husen (75) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:Actors from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Dan van Husen
